modName: Battlefield 3 Premium Combat Knife ACB-90_One-handed nonreplacer
descriptionHtml:
Instalation: Drag the data-folder into Skyrims main directory.

Ever fellt like you really want to get up close and personal with your foes, then the ACB-90 is just the right weapon for you. Straight out of Battlefield 3 this combat knife cuts the flesh of your enemies like a hot knife throu butter, (There\'s a reason why this knife only is avalible to certain Battlefield 3 players). Also comes with a rope cutter, (not usable in current version).

How to obtain: This weapon is only availible throu smithing so far and the recipe is unlocked along with the Ebony smithing perk.

Components required:1 Ebony ingot and 1 steel ingot.
Upgrading the weapon requires 1 ebony ingot.

Weapons stats
Damade: 11
Crit. damage: 6
Crit. Chance: 2%
Value: 400
Weight: 2

Programs used to make this mod: Cinema 4D, 3ds max, mudbox, nifskope, fallout archive, Creative Tool.
Made by Shrinkingcash and his fellow assistant PR95 who does the description writing.
author: Shrinkingcash
